name: INPlayMediaIntentResponse
desc: An intents handler's response to a play media intent.

items.name: init(code: INPlayMediaIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Create a response for a play media intent.

items.name: var code: INPlayMediaIntentResponseCode
items.desc: A response code that indicates whether the app can play the media.

items.name: enum INPlayMediaIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Codes returned by an app or Intents app extension when handling or confirming a play media intent.

items.name: var nowPlayingInfo: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The now-playing information, such as title and artwork, for the media.
